channel.title: 技术 on Askalan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in 技术 on Askalan's Blog

item.title: tech
item.description: Deepflow environment 配置 Agent Install Rust 1.curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh 2.source $HOME/.cargo/env Install Golang 1.wget https://golang.google.cn/dl/go1.19.5.linux-amd64.tar.gz 2.sudo tar -C /usr/local/ -xzf go1.19.5.linux-amd64.tar.gz 3.cd /usr/local/ 4.echo $PATH 5.sudo nano $HOME/.profile 6.source .profile Golang set Proxy(不然后面下载ibGoReSym下不下来) /etc/profile export GOPROXY=https://goproxy.cn Install Proto

item.title: 实习总结
item.description: Deepflow environment 配置 Server 1.Install Golang 1.1 wget https://golang.google.cn/dl/go1.19.5.linux-amd64.tar.gz 1.2 sudo tar -C /usr/local/ -xzf go1.19.5.linux-amd64.tar.gz 1.3 cd /usr/local/ 1.4 echo $PATH 1.5 sudo nano $HOME/.profile 1.6 source .profile 2.Install Protobuf-compiler dnf install -y protobuf-compiler 3.Set Proxy go env -w GO111MODULE=on go env -w GOPROXY=https://goproxy.cn,direct 4.Make Begin->cd /server make 4.1 缺protoc-gen-gofast 解
